page.title: 06SALMONHUTCH CUB CAMP CONTD.
page.content: quite fast flowing and deep in some places.About half an hour before lunch we went on a sort of treasure hunt.We went in groups of 6 and we went around Uton and Salmonhutch finding out the answers to the questions -Chris's tent won! After lunch we went on a long tracking game and after that we could do what we wanted. At 5.30pm we made boats to sail down the river.At 8.00pm we had a camp fire with the parents,then we had soup. After that we sailed our boats and went to bed. We still didn't get much sleep. {SUNDAY:-} At 7am Chris and Hugh went down to the river to see if any boats were left. There were four.After breakfast we went on a Sisal Trail where you follow a piece of string blindfolded and go over water and up banks.After that we packed up our tents and went home.
